title: The interactions of multisensory integration with endogenous and exogenous attention

tldr.text: A framework in which attention modulates multisensory processing in both endogenous (goal- driven) and exogenous (stimulus-driven) ways is proposed, which exerts not only bottom-up but also top-down control over attention.
